text:
PayPal | Lead Software Engineer | San Jose, Austin | Full-time | On-site, Remote

Web Platform Engineering at PayPal.

Looking for those with a great javascript skillset (client / server-side). Comfortable with infrastructure and frameworks. Public cloud experience a plus.

Benefits:

- Great culture, Autonomy

- Scale

- Great health care, packages, equity, etc.

Apply: https://goo.gl/ejXFqL
